marker.ph: <<local:ActivityFeedPage Title="Activities" Icon="heart.png" Padding="20" /> <local:MyProfilePage Title="Profile" Icon="user.png" Padding="20" />.../>

<<Button x:Name="Button" Clicked="Button_OnClicked" Text="Next"></Button> <Label x:Name="Label" Text="{Binding Value, StringFormat='Value is {0:N0}'}" Opacity="{Binding Value}" ></Label> <Slider x:Name="Slider" Maximum="50" Minimum="16" ></Slider> <Label x:Name="currentQuote" FontSize="{Binding Source={x:Reference Slider}, Path=Value}" />.../>
<<Button HorizontalOptions="Center" VerticalOptions="Center" Text="Click Me" Clicked="Handle_Clicked"></Button>.../>

<<StackLayout> <AbsoluteLayout BackgroundColor="SkyBlue"> <Image x:Name="image" Aspect="AspectFill" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0,0,1,1" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="All"></Image> <!--Source="{local:EmbeddedImage ResourceId=FirstProj.Image.background.jpg}"--> <ActivityIndicator Color="White" IsRunning="{Binding Source={x:Reference image},Path=IsLoading}" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.5, 0.05, 100, 100" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional"></ActivityIndicator>
<!--<Button x:Name="Prev" Clicked="Previous_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.05, 0.05, 100, 100" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional"> <Button.Image> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="FileImageSource" Android="left" iOS="left.png"></OnPlatform> </Button.Image>
</Button>-->
<Button Image="left" x:Name="Previous" Clicked="Previous_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.05, 0.05, 50, 50" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional" ></Button> <Button Image="right.png" x:Name="Next" Clicked="Next_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.95, 0.05, 50, 50" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional" ></Button> </AbsoluteLayout> <StackLayout VerticalOptions="EndAndExpand" HorizontalOptions="CenterAndExpand"> <Button x:Name="NextPage" Text="ListPage" Clicked="NextPage_Clicked"></Button> </StackLayout> </StackLayout>.../>

<<AbsoluteLayout BackgroundColor="SkyBlue"> <Image x:Name="image" Aspect="AspectFill" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0,0,1,1" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="All"></Image> <!--Source="{local:EmbeddedImage ResourceId=FirstProj.Image.background.jpg}"--> <ActivityIndicator Color="White" IsRunning="{Binding Source={x:Reference image},Path=IsLoading}" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.5, 0.05, 100, 100" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional"></ActivityIndicator>
<!--<Button x:Name="Prev" Clicked="Previous_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.05, 0.05, 100, 100" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional"> <Button.Image> <OnPlatform x:TypeArguments="FileImageSource" Android="left" iOS="left.png"></OnPlatform> </Button.Image>
</Button>-->
<Button Image="left" x:Name="Previous" Clicked="Previous_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.05, 0.05, 50, 50" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional" ></Button> <Button Image="right.png" x:Name="Next" Clicked="Next_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.95, 0.05, 50, 50" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional" ></Button> </AbsoluteLayout> <StackLayout VerticalOptions="EndAndExpand" HorizontalOptions="CenterAndExpand"> <Button x:Name="NextPage" Text="ListPage" Clicked="NextPage_Clicked"></Button> </StackLayout>.../>

<<Image x:Name="image" Aspect="AspectFill" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0,0,1,1" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="All"></Image> <ActivityIndicator Color="White" IsRunning="{Binding Source={x:Reference image},Path=IsLoading}" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.5, 0.05, 100, 100" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional"></ActivityIndicator> <Button Image="left" x:Name="Previous" Clicked="Previous_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.05, 0.05, 50, 50" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional" ></Button> <Button Image="right.png" x:Name="Next" Clicked="Next_OnClicked" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutBounds="0.95, 0.05, 50, 50" AbsoluteLayout.LayoutFlags="PositionProportional" ></Button>.../>
<<Button x:Name="NextPage" Text="ListPage" Clicked="NextPage_Clicked"></Button>.../>

<<Button x:Name="Button" Clicked="Button_OnClicked" Text="Next"></Button> <Label x:Name="Label" Text="{Binding Value, StringFormat='Value is {0:N0}'}" Opacity="{Binding Value}" ></Label> <Slider x:Name="Slider" Maximum="50" Minimum="16" ></Slider> <Label x:Name="currentQuote" FontSize="{Binding Source={x:Reference Slider}, Path=Value}" />.../>
